sprites_description.ui_score_panel: Score display background panel, dark rectangular UI element with subtle border, pixel art style with clean edges, front-facing view showing a container for score text, used to display current game score and high score information
sprites_description.ui_button_play: Start/play button in normal state, bright green rectangular button with rounded corners and 'PLAY' text, pixel art style with clean button design, front-facing view showing an interactive game start element, used to begin gameplay from the main menu
sprites_description.ui_button_play_hover: Start/play button in hover state, slightly brighter green rectangular button with enhanced visual feedback, pixel art style with subtle glow effect, front-facing view showing button interaction state, used to provide visual feedback when hovering over the play button
sprites_description.ui_button_restart: Restart button for game over screen, blue rectangular button with 'RESTART' text, pixel art style with contrasting colors, front-facing view showing a game reset control, used to restart the game after game over condition
sprites_description.ui_button_pause: Pause button icon, small square button with pause symbol (two vertical bars), pixel art style with simple geometric design, front-facing view showing a game control element, used to pause and unpause gameplay during active game sessions
